metadata.feature_description: Create multiple pages at once with validation and batch processing

steps.action: Navigate to Pages > Add Multiple Pages
steps.expected: Bulk page creation panel opens with settings and text area
steps.actual: Bulk page creation panel opened showing BULK PAGE SETTINGS and BULK PAGES TO ADD sections

steps.action: Enter three page names: BulkValidateTest1, BulkValidateTest2, BulkValidateTest3
steps.expected: Page names entered in text area, Validate button enabled
steps.actual: Page names entered successfully, Validate Page(s) button became enabled
Success message displayed: '3 pages were validated.'

steps.action: Enter page names and click Add Page(s) button with Test Approval Workflow
steps.actual: 500 Internal Server Error - 'An error has occurred.' message displayed

steps.action: Change workflow to Direct Publish and retry with new page names
steps.expected: Pages created successfully with Direct Publish workflow
steps.actual: 500 Internal Server Error persisted even with Direct Publish workflow

steps.action: Try creating single page via bulk interface
steps.actual: 500 Internal Server Error occurred even for single page creation

issues: Bulk page creation fails with 500 Internal Server Error regardless of workflow type
Error occurs even when attempting to create a single page through bulk interface
Validation works correctly but actual page creation API endpoint has server-side issue
Note: Pages may have been created despite error (observed in Branch Parent dropdown later)

steps.action: Enter existing page name 'Home' in bulk pages text area
steps.actual: Page name 'Home' entered in text area

steps.expected: Error message indicating duplicate page name
steps.actual: Error dialog displayed: 'Home: The Page Name you chose is already being used for another page at the same level of the page hierarchy.'

steps.action: Clear the bulk pages text area (leave it empty)
steps.expected: Action buttons should be disabled when no input provided
steps.actual: Validate Page(s) and Add Page(s) buttons are disabled when text area is empty

steps.action: Click Branch Parent dropdown to view available parent pages
steps.expected: Hierarchical list of pages displayed for selection
steps.actual: Page picker displayed with hierarchical list showing all available pages including My Website, Home, Our Products, etc.

steps.expected: Branch Parent changes to selected page

steps.actual: Validation succeeded: '1 pages were validated.' - page will be created under TestParentPage

observations: The PreSaveBulkPagesValidate API endpoint works correctly for validating pages before creation
The SaveBulkPages API endpoint returns 500 Internal Server Error, preventing actual page creation through the UI
Pages may have been partially created despite the error - BulkValidateTest1, BulkValidateTest2, BulkValidateTest3 appeared in the Branch Parent dropdown
The bulk page creation feature inherits settings from parent page (SkinSrc, ContainerSrc, permissions)
Evoq-specific features include TrackLinks and WorkflowId assignment for bulk pages
Code review shows proper duplicate detection within batch and against existing pages
Empty page name validation is implemented at UI level (buttons disabled) not just server level
